item.title: php max upload size
item.description: Check first where php.ini is (create a page that dumps “phpinfo()") Edit upload_max_filesize=10M (assuming 10M is the requested limit) 2.1 Given that ‘upload_max_filesize > 8M’ edit as well “post_max_size” Restart apache (reload doesn’t change the setting)
